function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Slowdown in technology advancements due to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Delayed implementation of 6G and other advanced technologies","Mitigation":"Investing in remote collaboration tools and flexible work arrangements","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, virtual communication technologies","People":"Technology developers, urban planners, businesses relying on advanced technologies","Owner":"Technology companies, urban planning authorities, business owners"},{"Description":"Increased reliance on smart wireless devices in urban areas","Impact":"Potential increase in data sharing and exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing data encryption and privacy measures, promoting remote and automated technologies","Technologies":"Data encryption software, remote and automated technologies","People":"Urban population, technology users, data analysts","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, technology companies"},{"Description":"Optimization of resource consumption in urban areas through big data and computational technologies","Impact":"Improved resource management and sustainability, but potential privacy concerns and data security risks","Mitigation":"Implementing data security measures, promoting responsible data usage, educating the public on data privacy","Technologies":"Data security software, responsible data usage guidelines","People":"Urban population, data analysts, technology developers","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, technology companies"}]}
